verses.verse: A good name <S%H8034><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than precious <S%H2896><s%> ointment <S%H8081><s%>; and the day <S%H3117><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%> than the day <S%H3117><s%> of one <S%H3205><s%>'s birth.

It is better <S%H2896><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of mourning <S%H60><s%>, than to go <S%H3212><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of feasting <S%H4960><s%>: for <S%H834><s%> that is the end <S%H5490><s%> of all men <S%H120><s%>; and the living <S%H2416><s%> will lay <S%H5414><s%> it to his heart <S%H3820><s%>.
Sorrow <S%H3708><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than laughter <S%H7814><s%>: for by the sadness <S%H7455><s%> of the favor <S%H6440><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> is made better <S%H3190><s%>.

The heart <S%H3820><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> is in the house <S%H1004><s%> of mourning <S%H60><s%>; but the heart <S%H3820><s%> of fools <S%H3684><s%> is in the house <S%H1004><s%> of mirth <S%H8057><s%>.
It is better <S%H2896><s%> to hear <S%H8085><s%> the rebuke <S%H1606><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%>, than for a man <S%H376><s%> to hear <S%H8085><s%> the song <S%H7892><s%> of fools <S%H3684><s%>.
For as the crackling <S%H6963><s%> of thorns <S%H5518><s%> under a pot <S%H5518><s%>, so is the laughter <S%H7814><s%> of the fool <S%H3684><s%>: this also is vanity <S%H1892><s%>.
Surely oppression <S%H6233><s%> makes a wise man <S%H2450><s%> mad <S%H1984><s%>; and a gift <S%H4979><s%> destroys <S%H6><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%>.

Better <S%H2896><s%> is the end <S%H319><s%> of a thing <S%H1697><s%> than the beginning <S%H7225><s%> there <S%H750><s%>: and the patient in spirit <S%H7307><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than the proud <S%H1362><s%> in spirit <S%H7307><s%>.
Be not hasty <S%H926><s%> in your spirit <S%H7307><s%> to be angry <S%H3707><s%>: for anger <S%H3708><s%> rests <S%H5117><s%> in the bosom <S%H2436><s%> of fools <S%H3684><s%>.

Say <S%H559><s%> not you <S%H7223><s%>, What is the cause that the former days <S%H3117><s%> were better <S%H2896><s%> than these <S%H7592><s%>? for you do not inquire wisely concerning this <S%H2451><s%>.
Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%> with a inheritance <S%H5159><s%>: and by it there is profit <S%H3148><s%> to them that see <S%H7200><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%>.

For wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is a defense <S%H6738><s%>, and money <S%H3701><s%> is a defense <S%H6738><s%>: but the excellency <S%H3504><s%> of knowledge <S%H1847><s%> is <S%H2451><s%>, that wisdom gives life <S%H2421><s%> to them that have it <S%H1167><s%>.
Consider <S%H7200><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>: for who can <S%H3201><s%> make that straight <S%H8626><s%>, which he has made crooked <S%H5791><s%>?

In the day <S%H3117><s%> of prosperity <S%H2896><s%> be joyful <S%H2896><s%>, but in the day <S%H3117><s%> of adversity <S%H7451><s%> consider <S%H7200><s%>: God <S%H430><s%> also has set <S%H6213><s%> the one over against <S%H5980><s%> the other <S%H1700><s%>, to the end that man <S%H120><s%> should find <S%H4672><s%> nothing <S%H3972><s%> after him <S%H310><s%>.

All things have I seen <S%H7200><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of my vanity <S%H1892><s%>: there is <S%H3426><s%> a just <S%H6662><s%> man that perishes <S%H6><s%> in his righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, and there is a wicked <S%H7563><s%> man that prolongs <S%H748><s%> his life in his wickedness <S%H7451><s%>.
Be not righteous <S%H6662><s%> over much <S%H7235><s%>; neither make yourself over <S%H3148><s%> wise <S%H2449><s%>: why should you destroy yourself <S%H8074><s%>?
Be not over much <S%H7235><s%> wicked <S%H7561><s%>, neither be you foolish <S%H5530><s%>: why should you die <S%H4191><s%> before your time <S%H6256><s%>?

It is good <S%H2896><s%> that you should take hold <S%H270><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%>; Yes, also from this withdraw <S%H3240><s%> not your hand <S%H3027><s%>: for he that fears <S%H3373><s%> God <S%H430><s%> shall come forth of them all <S%H3318><s%>.
Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> strengthens <S%H5810><s%> the wise <S%H2450><s%> more than ten <S%H6235><s%> mighty <S%H7989><s%> men which are in the city <S%H5892><s%>.
For there is not a just <S%H6662><s%> man <S%H120><s%> upon earth <S%H776><s%>, that does <S%H6213><s%> good <S%H2896><s%>, and sins not <S%H2398><s%>.
Also take <S%H5414><s%> no care <S%H3820><s%> unto all words <S%H1697><s%> that are spoken <S%H1696><s%>; lest you hear <S%H8085><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> curse you <S%H7043><s%>:
For oftentimes <S%H6471><s%> also your own heart <S%H3820><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> that you yourself likewise have cursed <S%H7043><s%> others <S%H312><s%>.
All this <S%H2090><s%> have I proved <S%H5254><s%> by wisdom <S%H2451><s%>: I said <S%H559><s%>, I will be wise <S%H2449><s%>; but it was far from me <S%H7350><s%>.
That which is far off <S%H7350><s%>, and exceedingly deep <S%H6013><s%>, who can find it out <S%H4672><s%>?

I applied <S%H5437><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%>, and to search <S%H8446><s%>, and to seek out <S%H1245><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, and the reason <S%H2808><s%> of things <S%H3045><s%>, and to know the wickedness <S%H7562><s%> of wickedness <S%H3689><s%>, even of foolishness <S%H5531><s%> and madness <S%H1947><s%>:

And I find <S%H4672><s%> more bitter <S%H4751><s%> than death <S%H4194><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%>, whose heart <S%H3820><s%> is snares <S%H4685><s%> and nets <S%H2764><s%>, and her hands <S%H3027><s%> as bands <S%H612><s%>: whoever pleases <S%H2896><s%> God <S%H430><s%> shall escape <S%H4422><s%> from her <S%H2398><s%>; but the sinner shall be taken by her <S%H3920><s%>.

Behold <S%H7200><s%>, this have I found <S%H4672><s%>, says <S%H559><s%> the preacher <S%H6953><s%>, counting one <S%H259><s%> by one <S%H259><s%>, to find out <S%H4672><s%> the account <S%H2808><s%>:

Which yet my soul <S%H5315><s%> seeks <S%H1245><s%>, but I find <S%H4672><s%> not <S%H259><s%>: one man <S%H120><s%> among a thousand <S%H505><s%> have I found <S%H4672><s%>; but a woman <S%H802><s%> among all those have I not found <S%H4672><s%>.

Behold <S%H7200><s%>, this only <S%H905><s%> have I found <S%H4672><s%>, that God <S%H430><s%> has made <S%H6213><s%> man <S%H120><s%> upright <S%H3477><s%>; but they have sought out <S%H1245><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> inventions <S%H2810><s%>.
